SEARCH

Package com.vincent.twopointer

package com.vincent.twopointer
This package will contain all the question involving two pointer such as
- Valid Palindrome (Leetcode 125)
- Sum of Three values (LeetCode 15, need to return indices)
- Remove nth Nodes from End of the List (LeetCode 19)
- Sort Colors (LeetCode 75)
- Reverse the world in String (LeetCode 151)
- VaLid word abbreviation (LeetCode 408)
- Valid Palindrome II (LeetCode 680)
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    RemoveNthLastNode
    Given a singled linked list, remove nth node from the tail and return its head LeetCode 19 Medium
    RemoveNthLastNodeTest
     
    ReverseWordInSentence
    LeetCode question 151 Medium
    Given a sentence reverse the order of the word in the sentence and remove trilling space and only 1 space between the word O(1) extra space
    ReverseWordTest
     
    SortColor
    LeetCode question 75, Difficulty: Medium
    Given an array combines 0 (red), 1(white), 2(blue)
    Sort them in red, white and blue order
    Constraint: 1 < colors.length < 300 and colors[i] only contains 0, 1, 2
    SortColorsTest
     
    ThreeSum
    Given an array of integers, nums, and an integer value, target, determine if there are any three integers in nums whose sum is equal to the target, that is, nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k] == target.
    ThreeSumList
    LeetCode #15, same requirement as ThreeSum but it need to return the index
    ThreeSumListTest
     
    ThreeSumTest
     
    TwoSum
    LeetCode question also can use two pointer Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.
    TwoSumTest
     
    ValidPalindrome
    Write a function that takes a string, s, as an input and determines whether it is a palindrome.
    ValidPalindromeII
    LeetCode #680 Easy Write a function that takes a string as input and checks whether it can be a valid palindrome by removing at most one character from it.
    ValidPalindromeIITest
     
    ValidPalindromeTest
     
    ValidWordAbbr
    LeetCode question # 408 - Easy Given a string word and an abbreviation abbr, return TRUE if the abbreviation matches the given string.
    ValidWordAbbrTest
